Poker hands.val: Any sequence of five in the same suit
Four cards of one rank,and one unmatched card of another rank
Three matching cards of one rank, and two matching cards of another rank
All five cards are of the same suit
Five cards of sequential rank, not the same suit
Three cards of one rank, and two unmatched cards of another rank
Two cards of the same rank, plus two cards of another rank, plus an unmatched card
Contains two cards of the same rank, plus three other unmatched cards
No two cards have the same rank, the five cards are not in sequence, and the five cards are not all the same suit
